title: Sweets Party
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Maki-chan, Maki-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You came over again?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>It’s because you commented on my sweets-making stream again......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>There were so many comments during the stream...... You saw it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Of course I did! I’m happy that you left a comment again. Because of that, I, um......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You brought over the financier cake you made yesterday?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufu. I tried making a financier sandwich with whipped cream and fruit. I wanted to make something special for you, Maki-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Oh, you~! You’re too kind, Ayumu! Nom......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>How is it......?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>It’s super delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
